comments.comment: Me boru numbers.. 1537 kata 6k wenne kohomada.. ehema wenna nam lankawe wenama corona version 1k wenna oni.  Hight time for the government to leave.. u did nothing for the country, same as esater government. No difference.. other parties the same too.. shame on u too oppositions for not helping to get the country to the right track rather preaching bulshits.
I heard SPAR supermarket kaduwella is closed and keells kottawa is closed due to covid positive could someone confirm
උඹලට චන්දෙ දුන්නේ ආසාධිතයින් හා මරණ ගණන් කිරීමට නොවේ ඉක්මනින් රටම lockdown කරපල්ලා
